description: The newIP trap indicates that a new IP address was learnt by the switch
in ifIndex ipNetToMediaIfIndex and a MAC address - in ipNetToMediaPhysAddress.
The IP address is given by ipNetToMediaNetAddress.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PRVT-SWITCH-FIB-MIB::newIP RFC1213-MIB::ipNetToMediaIfIndex i 9999 RFC1213-MIB::ipNetToMediaPhysAddress s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::ipNetToMediaNetAddress

description: The interface on which this entry's equivalence
is effective. The interface identified by a
particular value of this index is the same
interface as identified by the same value of
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ipNetToMediaIfIndex

description: The IpAddress corresponding to the media-
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ipNetToMediaNetAddress
